sources.title: The Inspector General
sources.description: An illiterate stooge in a traveling medicine show wanders into a strange town and is picked up on a vagrancy charge. The town's corrupt officials mistake him for the inspector general whom they think is traveling in disguise. Fearing he will discover they've been pocketing tax money, they make several bungled attempts to kill him. - IMDB Description

sources.title: The Inspector General
sources.description: Title: The Inspector General Summary: A town's corrupt officials think a fool is actually an investigator in disguise. Directed by: Henry Koster Actors: Danny Kaye, Walter Slezak, Barbara Bates Production Company: Warner Bros. Release Date: 31 December 1949 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An illiterate stooge in a traveling medicine show wanders into a strange town and is picked up on a vagrancy charge. The town's corrupt officials mistake him for the inspector general whom they think is traveling in disguise. Fearing he will discover they've been pocketing tax money, they make several bungled attempts to kill him.

sources.title: Inspector General, The
sources.description: Georgi (Danny Kaye) an illiterate member of a gypsy medicine show, is mistaken for the feared and cruel Inspector General.

sources.title: The Inspector General (1949) ELSA LANCHESTER
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX Special Edition!
Stars: Danny Kaye, Barbara Bates, Elsa Lanchester, Gene Lockhart
Writer: Nikolai Vasilievich Gogol (Based on a play by)
In this Technicolor tour-de-force, after a goodhearted soul is booted off a traveling medicine show, he stumbles into a village where he is mistaken for the Inspector General. Watch for the outstanding supporting cast including Walter Slezak, Alan Hale Sr., and MORE! 
CHAPTERS
0:00 Movie Class Introduction
3:57 Feature Synopsis
4:43 The Inspector General

metadata.Plot: An illiterate stooge in a traveling medicine show wanders into a strange town and is picked up on a vagrancy charge. The town's corrupt officials mistake him for the inspector general whom they think is traveling in disguise. Fearing he will discover they've been pocketing tax money, they make several bungled attempts to kill him.
